name: io-gui
description: Io-Gui, a UI framework for web development.

scripts.build: pnpm clean && pnpm lint && tsc --project ./tsconfig.json && rollup -c && dts-bundle-generator --export-referenced-types false -o bundle/io-gui.d.ts build/io-gui.d.ts && rm -rf build && mv bundle build
scripts.build:color: pnpm clean:color && pnpm lint:color && tsc --project ./packages/io-color/tsconfig.json && rollup -c ./packages/io-color/rollup.config.js && dts-bundle-generator --export-referenced-types false -o packages/io-color/bundle/io-color.d.ts ./packages/io-color/build/io-color.d.ts && rm -rf ./packages/io-color/build && mv ./packages/io-color/bundle ./packages/io-color/build
scripts.build:icons: pnpm clean:icons && pnpm lint:icons && tsc --project ./packages/io-icons/tsconfig.json && rollup -c ./packages/io-icons/rollup.config.js && dts-bundle-generator --export-referenced-types false -o packages/io-icons/bundle/index.d.ts ./packages/io-icons/build/index.d.ts && dts-bundle-generator --export-referenced-types false -o packages/io-icons/bundle/index.test.d.ts ./packages/io-icons/build/index.test.d.ts && rm -rf ./packages/io-icons/build && mv ./packages/io-icons/bundle ./packages/io-icons/build
scripts.build:inputs: pnpm clean:inputs && pnpm lint:inputs && tsc --project ./packages/io-inputs/tsconfig.json && rollup -c ./packages/io-inputs/rollup.config.js && dts-bundle-generator --export-referenced-types false -o packages/io-inputs/bundle/index.d.ts ./packages/io-inputs/build/index.d.ts && dts-bundle-generator --export-referenced-types false -o packages/io-inputs/bundle/index.test.d.ts ./packages/io-inputs/build/index.test.d.ts && rm -rf ./packages/io-inputs/build && mv ./packages/io-inputs/bundle ./packages/io-inputs/build
scripts.build:inspector: pnpm clean:inspector && pnpm lint:inspector && tsc --project ./packages/io-inspector/tsconfig.json && rollup -c ./packages/io-inspector/rollup.config.js && dts-bundle-generator --export-referenced-types false -o packages/io-inspector/bundle/io-inspector.d.ts ./packages/io-inspector/build/io-inspector.d.ts && rm -rf ./packages/io-inspector/build && mv ./packages/io-inspector/bundle ./packages/io-inspector/build
scripts.build:markdown: pnpm clean:markdown && pnpm lint:markdown && tsc --project ./packages/io-markdown/tsconfig.json && rollup -c ./packages/io-markdown/rollup.config.js && dts-bundle-generator --export-referenced-types false -o packages/io-markdown/bundle/io-markdown.d.ts ./packages/io-markdown/build/io-markdown.d.ts && rm -rf ./packages/io-markdown/build && mv ./packages/io-markdown/bundle ./packages/io-markdown/build
scripts.build:menus: pnpm clean:menus && pnpm lint:menus && tsc --project ./packages/io-menus/tsconfig.json && rollup -c ./packages/io-menus/rollup.config.js && dts-bundle-generator --export-referenced-types false -o packages/io-menus/bundle/io-menus.d.ts ./packages/io-menus/build/io-menus.d.ts && rm -rf ./packages/io-menus/build && mv ./packages/io-menus/bundle ./packages/io-menus/build
scripts.build:navigator: pnpm clean:navigator && pnpm lint:navigator && tsc --project ./packages/io-navigator/tsconfig.json && rollup -c ./packages/io-navigator/rollup.config.js && dts-bundle-generator --export-referenced-types false -o packages/io-navigator/bundle/io-navigator.d.ts ./packages/io-navigator/build/io-navigator.d.ts && rm -rf ./packages/io-navigator/build && mv ./packages/io-navigator/bundle ./packages/io-navigator/build
scripts.build:sliders: pnpm clean:sliders && pnpm lint:sliders && tsc --project ./packages/io-sliders/tsconfig.json && rollup -c ./packages/io-sliders/rollup.config.js && dts-bundle-generator --export-referenced-types false -o packages/io-sliders/bundle/io-sliders.d.ts ./packages/io-sliders/build/io-sliders.d.ts && rm -rf ./packages/io-sliders/build && mv ./packages/io-sliders/bundle ./packages/io-sliders/build
